entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
